titles: Ten sermons Preached by that eloquent divine of famous memorie, Th. Playfere Doctor in Divinitie
author: Playfere, Thomas, 1561?-1609.
D. C., fl. 1610-1612.
publisher: Printed by Cantrell Legge, printer to the Vniversitie of Cambridge,
notes: Nine sermons only, of which 6, 7, 8, 5 are reprinted from STC 20026. Later editions entitled "Nine sermons".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
